They bring extensive experience in the payments","score":0.8325776,"raw_content":null},{"title":"Arul Kumaravel - Tazapay - LinkedIn Singapore","url":"https://sg.linkedin.com/in/arulk","content":"Arul Kumaravel
Co-Founder & CTO at TazaPay
Singapore
500 connections, 13701 followers


About
Accomplished Technology Leader with extensive experience in building and leading teams through full-cycle project management, strategic product development and marketing initiatives. Directed the development of numerous high-profile products for Microsoft, Amazon, Grab reaching millions of customers worldwide.  Combines strong background in both business and technology for dynamic and innovative approaches toward business strategy and revenue growth. Holds a Master of Business Administration in Finance & Strategic Management from the University of Pennsylvania. Fluent in English and Tamil.

Specialties: 
Software Development
Project Management
Software Management
Product Development
Full Lifecycle Management
Business Strategy
Strategic Planning / Analysis
Marketing
Revenue Growth
Team Development / Management


Experience
Co-Founder & CTO
[Tazapay](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tazapay/)  
January 2020 - Present
Singapore
TazaPay is a dynamic Singapore-based fintech start-up dedicated to facilitating seamless cross-border payments. We provide comprehensive solutions, including checkout, payment links, and escrow services, aimed at simplifying international transactions while mitigating risks for both buyers and sellers in the online marketplace. We successfully secured Series A funding from key investors, including Sequoia.

•	Spearheaded the development of the MVP, laying the foundation for our ground-breaking fintech solution. Designed and architected the product as a cutting-edge, cloud-native application, ensuring scalability and efficiency. Drove alignment across teams for using a scalable integrated architecture to facilitate more cross-vertical initiatives
•	Led the growth of our engineering team to >50 dedicated engineers. Developed L&D programs to accelerate onboarding and maximize growth. Successfully groomed 4 engineers into engineering leads, empowering them to effectively manage their respective teams.
•	Drove exponential business growth, elevating our monthly TPV from $0 to $300M, maintaining a monthly double-digit growth rate. 
•	Navigated complex regulatory landscapes in Canada and Singapore, securing multiple essential licenses and ensuring full compliance with regulatory frameworks in these countries.
•	Led funding efforts and secured a US$3.2M seed funding from Sequoia in Dec 2020 and US$1.8M in Mar 2021 to accelerate our regional growth.
•	Member of the CTO advisory group of our investors, offering strategic insights to support their portfolio companies.
•	Served as a mentor to numerous CTOs and Heads of Engineering in Southeast Asia, actively participating in the regional start-up ecosystem.


Education
The Wharton School
Master in Business Administration, Finance & Strategic Management
2007 - 2009

Fintech and Payments | Founder | Stripe | PayPal
Singapore
500 connections, 20528 followers


About
I love payments and Fintech and am passionate about using the power to tech to solve real world problems and truly democratise commerce and trade.  I have worked in payments  for over 20 years at PayPal and Stripe. I call Singapore home, am married and  have 2 lovely daughters. 
Through my corporate career, I have strived to build high performance teams, develop talent and help people find their true north. I believe diversity is a fact and inclusion is a choice and have worked hard to create a diverse and inclusive workplace. Company culture and organisation systems,  eat vision, mission and tech prowess for breakfast, and I hope to create an organisation where people are proud of their craft, have deep respect for their colleagues  and driven by the problem we are trying to solve.


Experience
Co-founder and CEO
[Tazapay](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tazapay/)  
May 2020 - Present
Singapore
Tazapay is a  cross-border payment platform offering both an integrated checkout solution for merchants and marketplaces, as well as payment links for negotiated, larger value deals. Tazapay has built a network of local collections via local banks and real time schemes in over 80 markets, this network is exposed over a single API – offering merchants a cost effective and secure way of collecting cross border payments. 
The company is licensed and has established product market fit with cross border ecommerce , Gaming and B2B marketplaces
 
The team size is around 100 full time employees and we have raised ~$20 Million so far.
We are backed by Sequoia , Saisson Capital, PayPal , RTP global and January Capital 



We are hiring across engineering, product marketing, risk and GTM, please DM if interested.


Education
NMIMS
MBA, Marketing/Marketing Management, General
1997 - 1999

result.result: Tazapay is a fintech company offering a comprehensive international payment gateway that enables businesses to manage cross-border transactions efficiently. It was co-founded by Rahul Shinghal (Co-Founder & CEO), Saroj Mishra (Co-Founder & COO), and Arul Kumaravel (Co-Founder & CTO). Rahul Shinghal has over 20 years of experience in payments at companies like PayPal and Stripe. Arul Kumaravel has extensive experience in technology leadership and product development, having worked with companies such as Microsoft, Amazon, and Grab. Tazapay is a Singapore-based startup backed by investors including Sequoia and offers solutions like integrated checkout, payment links, and escrow services.
result.summary: The founders of Tazapay were identified along with their roles and backgrounds, and a brief overview of the company and its services was provided.

data.content: Tazapay is a fintech company offering a comprehensive international payment gateway that enables businesses to manage cross-border transactions efficiently. It was co-founded by Rahul Shinghal (Co-Founder & CEO), Saroj Mishra (Co-Founder & COO), and Arul Kumaravel (Co-Founder & CTO). Rahul Shinghal has over 20 years of experience in payments at companies like PayPal and Stripe. Arul Kumaravel has extensive experience in technology leadership and product development, having worked with companies such as Microsoft, Amazon, and Grab. Tazapay is a Singapore-based startup backed by investors including Sequoia and offers solutions like integrated checkout, payment links, and escrow services.
